name: Not Enough Space (kuz2103)
description:
This is Not Enough Space!

It is a quick and simple point and click top down shooter. It is also one of my first projects I have done in game development overall. This was also made for the Blackthornprod Game Jam 3.

The goal is to shoot all the enemies in each level. The twist is that the less bullets you have the more damage you can do. Also, the less health you have the more speed you have.

Thanks for checking my game out and hope you enjoy(ed) it!
